stem.paragraph: Match each description in the left column with the area on the graphic that it describes by selecting the appropriate cell on the right.

page.prompt: CORRECTLY MATCH THE ITEMS. THEN SELECT SUBMIT TO RECEIVE FEEDBACK.

feedbacks.feedback: Incorrect. One or more of your answers is incorrect. Please try again.
Correct! You have correctly matched each description with to the area it describes on the graphic. Click the Next Arrow to continue.
Incorrect. You have not correctly matched each description with to the area it describes on the graphic. Click the Next Arrow to continue.
